resources.string: Select an Item For More Information:

This tab shows restaurants you added to a list where the application will randomly select one restaurant from the entire list.

To randomly select a restaurant click on the "ROLL RESTAURANTS" button in the top right hand corner.

The number on the right column indicates the likelihood that a restaurant will be chosen.
The higher the number the more likely the restaurant will be chosen.

You can increase or decrease this number by pressing on the UP and UP arrows above and below the number.

To remove a restaurant SWIPE RIGHT on the restaurant.

This tab shows restaurants that you add yourself instead of from Yelp.

To add your own restaurant, click the "ADD RESTAURANT" button in the top right.

From here you can give a restaurant name and custom tags. When you press "CONFIRM", the restaurant is added to your favorites list.

To add a restaurant to the roller, click the "ADD TO ROLL" button in the right column.

To delete a restaurant, SWIPE RIGHT on the restaurant.

This tab shows the search results of the SEARCH tab.

Here you can filter search results with a tag to narrow down the list of restaurants.

To add a restaurant to the roller, click the "ADD TO ROLL" button in the right column.

This tab allows you to search Yelp for restaurants.

You can type in a name to search under the SEARCH FOR field.

You can set a maximum distance up to 25 miles.

You can set a minimum Yelp review rating.

You can set a Yelp price range.

After you are finished preparing your search, click the SEARCH button on the bottom. The button should automatically take you to the SEARCH RESULTS tab.
